title: Disconnecting frequently during games
body:
The last two games I have played I have disconnected 3 times in both of them, and I know it's not a wifi problem because my discord works throughout the whole time and there has been no ping higher than 100 in those games, yet this is the first time this has happened to me in this way. The way it disconnects is that I'm in a game and all of a sudden I get alt tabbed out of it and back to the client where the reconnect button is on it. I highly doubt that it has something to do with my keyboard either because the last time it happened I wasn't even touching my keyboard or mouse. The one thing I think it might have been was, 2 days ago I had to restart my pc because of an update and the only 2 games I've played were the 2 that I was dc'ing.
Any suggestions are appreciated, thanks.

replies.body:
Since the game is minimizing and you can see the client with the reconnect button, it definitely sounds like your network is having a hard time keeping a stable connection with our servers. The last windows update you had may have adjusted some of your network settings, so let's be sure to check there first.

Check out this [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some steps we can take to troubleshoot. Let me know how that helps!
Also I am using an ethernet, but the connection before the update of windows was still having very inconsistent ping having over 2000 for over 5 minutes straight.

Okay, so the hextech log finisihed, and it said everything looked okay, but there was one part where it said I needed to run it as an admin, the Syncing system clock part. There was the firewall added and then there was this "Ethernet 2:
Changing to DHCP... Done"

Hmmmmm, it might be best for our tech guys to be able to go over those hextech logs with you. Go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attach the logs the repair tool gave you!
